entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.5°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 24. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 22 February 2023
